events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department to ensure the right team reviews your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will contact you soon to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed, where your software development experience and problem-solving skills were discussed in detail.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm following the initial screening; we appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week to further evaluate your coding abilities and system design knowledge.
You successfully completed the technical interview where you demonstrated excellent proficiency in software engineering concepts and practical problem solving.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, your work preferences, and benefits related questions.
You completed the HR interview successfully, demonstrating strong alignment with our company values and teamwork expectations.
We have extended a formal offer to you based on your impressive technical skills and excellent interview performance.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer and for sharing your excitement about potentially joining our engineering organization.
We are pleased to confirm that you have accepted our job offer, and we look forward to having you onboard as a valuable member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome aboard! We are excited to help you get introduced to the team's projects and workplace.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with you joining our engineering team. We are confident you will make outstanding contributions.
